db:abstract.db:para: A demo browser based on Qt WebEngine Widgets.

column="0" > <spacer> <property name="orientation" > <enum>Qt::Horizontal</enum> </property> <property name="sizeHint" stdset="0" > <size> <width>252</width> <height>20</height> </size> </property> class="QDialogButtonBox" name="buttonBox" > <property name="standardButtons" > <set>QDialogButtonBox::Ok</set> </property> </widget> </item> </layout> </item> </layout> </widget> <customwidgets>
